Class MandelbrotSetJob

java.lang.Object
  client.MandelbrotSetJob
All Implemented Interfaces:
Job
public class MandelbrotSetJob
extends java.lang.Object
implements Job

Defines how the MandelbrotSet problem is broken up into tasks Task and later, combines the solutions for subdivided tasks into solution for the overall problem

Author:
Vijayaraghavan Subbaiah
